summary:
Meditation is a way to train your mind to focus and relax. It helps you calm your thoughts and feelings without judging them. There are two main types: focused (concentrating on something specific) and open monitoring (being aware of your thoughts).

People have meditated for thousands of years in many religions, like Jainism, Buddhism, Hinduism, Judaism, Christianity, and Islam. Today, people also use meditation for health and stress relief, even in business. Studies show it can help with stress, anxiety, and pain.
title: Meditation
